heroContent.textA: Gestiona todo desde el mismo lugar
heroContent.textB: Una plataforma integral de gestión inmobiliaria con IA integrada, creada por y para property managers.

applicationDescription.title: Rentmote te facilita la gestión de tus alquileres
applicationDescription.description: La aplicación reduce los tiempos de gestión, minimiza impagos y garantiza una experiencia eficiente para los gestores de propiedades, inmobiliarias y propietarios.

characteristicsSection.title: Una plataforma para gestionarlo todo
characteristicsSection.description: Expande tu negocio sin contratiempos utilizando una plataforma de gestión unificada que respalda todos tus activos.

cards.title: Gestión de Propiedades
cards.description: Simplificación la gestión de propiedades. Permite ahorrar tiempo y esfuerzo mientras optimiza sus resultados.

cards.title: Gestión de cuentas
cards.description: Gestiona las cuentas tanto de ingresos como egresos de manera intantanea, generando reportes de los diferentes estados financieros.

cards.title: Pago Automatizado
cards.description: Configura pagos automatizados para simplificar la gestión de tus propiedades, brindándote tranquilidad y ahorrándote tiempo.

cards.title: Seguimiento de incidencias
cards.description: Organiza y gestiona las incidencias reportadas, permitiendo generar reportes para monitorear y priorizar el estado de cada incidencia.

supportSection.title: Contactanos
supportSection.description: Por favor, selecciona el area de soporte con la cuál deseas contactarte.

heroContent.textA: Manage everything from the same place.
heroContent.textB: A comprehensive real estate management platform with integrated AI, created by and for property managers.

applicationDescription.title: Rentmote makes managing your rentals easier.
applicationDescription.description: The application reduces management time, minimizes missed payments, and ensures an efficient experience for property managers, property management companies, and property owners.

characteristicsSection.title: One platform to manage everything
characteristicsSection.description: Expand your business seamlessly by leveraging a unified management platform that supports all your assets.

cards.title: Properties Manager
cards.description: Simplifying property management. It saves time and effort while optimizing your results.

cards.title: Account Manager
cards.description: Manage both income and expense accounts instantly, generating reports of the different financial statements.

cards.title: Automatic Payment
cards.description: Set up automated payments to simplify your rental management, providing peace of mind and saving you time.

cards.title: Incidents Following
cards.description: Organize and manage reported incidents, allowing you to generate reports to monitor and prioritize the status of each incident

supportSection.title: Contact Us
supportSection.description: Please select the support area you'd like to contact.
